name: Grump's Quest
blurb: Pick up your blade and cut down demons and beasts in a dark and visually awesome cinematic adventure game of strategy and skill.

rewards.reward: ~$15. The opportunity for you to access your own RELEASE VERSION OF THE GAME and be the first to experience GRUMP'S QUEST in all it's glory. Exclusive members access to the forum with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE against your name. Access to the MAKING OF BLOG.

~$30. Access an EXCLUSIVE POWER OR TOOL only available to backers. The opportunity for you to access your own RELEASE VERSION OF THE GAME and be the first to experience GRUMP'S QUEST in all it's glory. Exclusive members access to the forum with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE against your name. Access to the MAKING OF BLOG.

~$60. Collectors digital tier. DIGITAL MAP, DIGITAL CONCEPT ART, WALLPAPERS, RING TONES and an EBOOK of the making of GRUMP'S QUEST filled with full colour original concept art, production photos, script ideas and more. Access an EXCLUSIVE POWER OR TOOL only available to backers, Exclusive members access to the forum with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE against your name. Access to the MAKING OF BLOG.

~$100. Be the VERY FIRST to access the BETA VERSION of the game, via Testflight or Launchpad. VIP FORUM BADGE. Access an EXCLUSIVE POWER OR TOOL only available to backers, Exclusive members access to the forum with a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE against your name. Access to the MAKING OF BLOG. Shipping is free within the UK but please add an additional \u00a310 or $15 to your pledge to cover international shipping.

~$7950. The highest and ultimate pledge. To thank you personally we invite you to VISIT THE STUDIO in London, UK and have lunch with Will Rockall and Simon Hodgkiss and meet the lead artists, developers and musicians for a great day. We'll make a CHARACTER PORTRAIT IMAGE of you that will APPEAR IN THE GAME, immortalizing you for all to see, and a hard copy of it for you to take away and keep. We will credit you in the game and book as a major contributor. Have a PERSONAL MESSAGE recorded by one of the voice artists as a ring tone. Hardcover GRUMP'S QUEST BOOK filled with full colour original concept art, production photos, script ideas and more, signed by Will Rockall, Simon Hodgkiss and the lead artists on the inside front cover. Access an EXCLUSIVE POWER OR TOOL only available to backers, Exclusive members access to the forum with a KICKSTARTER VIP BACKER BADGE against your name. Access to the MAKING OF BLOG. \r\nIf you would like a different combination of rewards let us know and we'll work with you.\r\nShipping your rewards is free with this tier although you will need to cover the cost of transport and accommodation to the Rockkiss studio in London.
